website_summaries.verdict: Simple to use and active for hours after each application, Glade air fresheners are a sweet-smelling solution and an excellent value at 12 cans per pack.
pros: Large variety of available scents, including red honeysuckle nectar and crisp waters
Lasts for up to 7 hours at a time
cons: While Glade’s air fresheners smell good, keep in mind that these sprays are not air disinfectants

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for in the end.
customer_reviews.text: has a nice scent.. its good value for ur money but im very unhappy with 1 or 2 of the products. it was everywhere the foam. when i opened it its a wet mess. the others were safe though all i had to do was wipe with a wash cloth. not bad but sad about those. i tried to still used the jacked up one but nothing sprays from the nozzle. the other ones are completely fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jxofo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend! Love this Scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent! I have this scent in the refill plug ins too. I can’t believe you get 12 cans! For $11.88! For just 1 can in the store is over $3.50 so this is a great buy. I’m going to get more. Update: 11/14/17. 1 problem, as I spray, it drips down the front, it has happened on each can I use, not sure why this is happening, maybe to 1 can but not to 5 cans so far. Still a great price though.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: A twelve pack will last for a WHILE
customer_reviews.text: Huge pack, I ordered back in September and we've used maybe two. Definitely will last you awhile, smell Great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Like being in a tropical flower green house
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice powerful air freshener but not an overwhelming scent even when sprayed heavily. If it drifts into the hallway it smells like a tropical flower green house to our guests just walking in
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mike

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: Find this fragrance very pleasant. Perfect for all areas of my home--bathrooms, laundry room, kitty litter space, kitchen.... Tried to re-purchase at local grocery store, but they are always out of stock or have only one or two cans available. Surprise! Amazon reliably provides quantity and saves me money with Subscribe & Save program. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: XYZ Lady

customer_reviews.title: This Lavender & Vanilla  very wired smell make me want to throw up
customer_reviews.text: This Lavender & Vanilla very wired smell make me want to throw up
customer_reviews.author: H@rr1

customer_reviews.title: For odors not a disinfectant but nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case. Good scent. Fair price. I wanted to have them handy as needed. However, I use disinfectant sprays not air fresheners, like this for places where I suspect mold and mildew build up, like linens, upholstery, bathroom shower curtains, etc. as we have so much of that here in Florida. This is an air freshener for masking odors and does not disinfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scent and value for money with powerful spray.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great for this product. The Glade especially sprays till the very end which is important to me because others mostly do not. It also has a powerful spray not just a little Wimpy spray. Definitely would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Truhe

customer_reviews.title: I love the brand just not the scent
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I regret buying this air freshener definitely not for me
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as the price was great. The apple Cinnamon Spray smells really fragrant. Can't beat the price for 12! Very happy with this order
customer_reviews.author: Oorah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell, good value
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a whole case. Cheaper than going to my local everything for a dollar store! The lavender vanilla smells really nice. And I love that I won’t have to buy it for a while either.
customer_reviews.author: cathy z

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Lavender & Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: Prefer Lavender & Vanilla, it smells much nicer. This one ok, but not as good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Suck, big clogging problem........
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money had to get rid of half box for clogging issues......
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy it. This is a scam. I only recieved one can. The price said $.12 per ounce, so I should recieve more than one can!
customer_reviews.author: John Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: I cut into one on accident while opening the box I had one burst this time it was not amazons fault I did it.I give it 5 Stars it smells like vanilla tulips.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L Burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice Smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell! It really helps get rid of a stinky or stale bathroom. It doesn't make the rug wet like some other brands do.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Why buy 1 can at time
customer_reviews.text: Still have half left much better way to buy to buy than 1 can at time at brick and mortar store 3X the price plus gas and time
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Apple Cinnamon fragrance has changed and not for the better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same apple cinnamon about a year ago. Then again recently. Was very disappointed in the fragrance. Apparently glade has changed their formula. There is less of a cinnamon smell to it. It does not fight the odor as well as before. Also the picture shows a red cap which is what I got the first time. So something has changed because it has a tan cap now. I understand they do redesign packaging, but the formula has definitely changed. Will be sending a message to the company on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Beautiful scent. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. 12 cans for a great price. Scent is lovely. I was afraid of buying so many if the scent turned out to be offensive but I really like it. And the scent lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Laura-Jill Goldwyn

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is quite pleasing. Not over powering, and yet is kinda like being in the garden and smelling the flowers
customer_reviews.author: Terry H. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Wanted clean linen one-hard to get now-very good with odors but I like less "perfumed" sprays
customer_reviews.author: daditch

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: At less than a dollar a can, its perfect for the office powder room! One spray goes along way. The only negative is the loud sound it makes when spraying. Wish it was quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabet

customer_reviews.title: Air fresheners
customer_reviews.text: Is cheaper to get in the store but worth coming to the door with apt living. Hopefully all grocery items 1 day...

customer_reviews.title: The scent of Fall and Winter
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. I am so happy to find these. Especially the price. What a Deal! I added them to auto delivery.

customer_reviews.title: paid more for scent I wanted! :-(
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent and I can’t seem to find it anymore in stores! so I found it online and ordered a dozen!! lol problem: $0.98 at Walmart and this was like 30 cents more each can!! bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very light short term scent
customer_reviews.text: Presentation is nice however scent is weaker than earlier versions of 9 months ago. Would Not purchase again. Bought a case & gave 60% away.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, reasonable price, home delivery, I would buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than Walmart and I didn't have to go to Walmart! LMAO! Thanks Amazon!

customer_reviews.text: Packaged great, all cans full, none leaked. shipped fast. Love the smell.

customer_reviews.title: UNSATISFACTORY shopping experience  !

customer_reviews.title: My House Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. You can spray it in any room and it leaves a soft (not over whelming scent). You can use it the restroom too and it doesn't just mask the scent but it replaces any foul odors.

customer_reviews.text: You get 12 8oz cans. I will post a pic of what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent at a good value in bulk.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than stores. Great scent and does what it's supposed to do!

customer_reviews.title: Spray
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. I wish could have been a variety but still great price

customer_reviews.title: The Scent is always Good
customer_reviews.text: In the age of the pandemic, I have a reluctance about going out. Amazon has my favorite scent so I took the liberty to order a large order of my favorite scent. The package was delivered on time in the scent that I wanted, Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a lavender field.

customer_reviews.text: I love buying in bulk and I love this scent

customer_reviews.title: Scent not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not what I expected at all. I expected it to smell fresh & clean but it smells fruity! I won’t order this scent again.

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance
customer_reviews.text: The best thing out there for people who don't like sweet-smelling stuff. Decent price, too.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: This particular scent is probably my favorite. Smells so good. I use it in just about every room in the house.

customer_reviews.title: Love lavender. Fine mist cloud doesn't get surfaces wet.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fine mist spray that doesn't make surfaces wet. Love the lavender scent. Just right for making bathroom or room odors less noticeable.

customer_reviews.title: Office
customer_reviews.text: Great for the office I just wish they had a variety pack of different fragrances.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's not over powering and the blend of vanilla and licac is nice not to sweet smelling.

customer_reviews.text: This product has no scent. I have bought it from the store once and it smelled great so I decided to get a bulk from amazon to have and when I sprayed a brand new bottle there was no scent.

customer_reviews.title: Scent smells like baby powder.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like baby powder. Not like lavender and vanilla at all.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best glade scents available
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best scents out there. We use it to cover pet smells, cooking smells, or to have a clean smell around to relax to.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have used 5 cannisters of this air freshener and all have stopped spraying with a substantial amount of the product left. I would say at least half to two thirds remains unusable. So much waste!

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! Now I don’t have to go it to buy any for a while! Worth every penny!

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item I didn't read all of the title so I order 2 thinking I would get two single bottles and end up geting 24 bottles lol. oh well I will read all of the title next time 😂

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is great for quickly masking foul odors. The scent lasts longe enough for temporary foul odors to dissipate. Product is also affordable and nicely packaged.

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Freshner; Love it!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this Air Freshener!!! I've used other Glade flavors I'll say in the past and though they do make Great Products, This Lavender/Peach Blossom is a True Winner!!!! I buy it by the case because I use it at home and at the Office. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great scent - too high here
customer_reviews.text: Great scent & love these for bathroom & other areas. Unfortunately has gotten too expensive to order via Amazon. Would recommend product but find a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Very little fragrance But Want more Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: It does not smell at all I sprayed for 30 sec then I can smell it .I bought big bulk can’t return but Why I am unsatisfied customer .
customer_reviews.author: kauser

customer_reviews.title: The Glade air fresheners are a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the Glade air fresheners smelled! They smelled great! The fresh scent lasted for days! Thank you for a great product!

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and great price
customer_reviews.text: So many sprays for such a low price. definitely worth the money and it smells great

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mix of these two smells. The item it is just wonderful !!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sent! The best sent they have ever made! I just wish it would last longer after you spray it.

customer_reviews.title: A sweet smelling deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got a whole box full of air fresheners (12) for what I would pay for three cartridges locally! Such a good deal!

customer_reviews.title: Does it kill bugs?
customer_reviews.text: This scent has the aroma of insecticide. I think RAID smells better than this.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air freshener! So glad I discovered it!

customer_reviews.text: So happy to have something 2eliminate my car smells—when anyone visits they can’t believe I have a cat 🐾😊

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best fragrance for me and my home. Outstanding price thank you Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love Product - Love Scent
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this product for this price...very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clean Odor
customer_reviews.text: We have two bathrooms - and keep Glade in each one. The fresh linen odor is not too pungent - more like clean laundry on the clothesline. A 12-pack may seem like too many to buy at once - but at least we are well stocked.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Glade Air Freshener
customer_reviews.text: Great product love scent and lasts for long time. Would recommend it for all types of household odors.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, smells great really eliminates odor, I love the smell, good value when you buy in bulk

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Glade Aerosol.......
customer_reviews.text: We discovered this one weekend as we were doing errands and my wife and I both love it! We use it at home, and at our business.......couldn't live without it.........

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy perfume but a nice fresh scent and eliminates orders well.

customer_reviews.title: it smells awsome
customer_reviews.text: i love the smell.-i give it to other people to try and everyone loves it too. i have gotten it several times more-great stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Can not full?????  Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance, but can doesn't seem full....doesn't last nearly as long as what I've bought elsewhere!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Airfreshner has amazing scent, better than I imagined

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this scent
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the lavender and vanilla. This one is way too sweet. Smell makes me nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Browne

customer_reviews.title: Keep This Item In Stock !
customer_reviews.text: Liked The Product, Wait For It To Come, Not Sure If I Was Going To Get It. Use Item For My Home !
customer_reviews.author: Tony A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with the wonderful Hawaiian fragrance that makes the bathroom smell wonderful. Not a heavy scent, nice and lite.
customer_reviews.author: dals_trains

customer_reviews.title: 12 cans of  Glade Powder Fresh spray
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I very much like this powder fresh fragrance of Glade. When I flush the toilet, I spray the water in the bowl and thereby get no spray on the ceiling, floor, walls or on me! It leaves the room smelling really nice. Accidentally, I wrote this same review for a single can of SUPPOSEDLY powder fresh, which arrived as the horrible linen fragrance. I love Powder Fresh; I can't stand linen smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product Came exactly as described. What a great deal 12 cans for only $ 11.88.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Gukasyan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great gift idea for my sons who loves this stuff
customer_reviews.author: G-mama

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a smell.
customer_reviews.text: my case seemed old...the spray fragrance was very light, too light. Liked the smell just wasn't much of it unless I really sprayed for a long time. Normally, I like Glade but think this was a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bell

customer_reviews.title: Here is why Lavender and Vanilla is 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Attractive appearance, good size, very good price delivered to your door in storable box AND most of all it smells wonderful, sprays properly, no drips or overly wet walls , floors or furniture, it just dispenses correctly. We love the Lavender and Vanilla,
customer_reviews.author: Omnivorous Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love this frangrance and they've stopped carrying it a the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Weller

customer_reviews.title: The scent is very nice and reminds me of holidays
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I hadn't realized just how many were in this order! I received a dozen cans for apprx $11.50. That's a deal. The scent is very nice and reminds me of holidays.
customer_reviews.author: *Rock Star*Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: The one with the tan cap is weak
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought this same scent in Glade Apple Cinnamon but it had a red cap. This one I'm talking about today has a tan cap. The tan cap doesn't work - weak scent and it only lasts for a minute. Look for the red cap. The red cap's scent is stronger and last a lot longer, it's a really good scent. The tan cap has the same scent but it's very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M-M

customer_reviews.title: Whole house!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the soft wonder smell and can use it on everything ( furniture, carpets, pillows, anywhere) . When company comes, I spray it everywhere. The price is so reasonable that in out 4,000 square foot house one bottle does every room with extra to put in the bathroom. I will alway buy from this company as you can’t beat the price, but I keep a drawer full.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Love

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, great scent, no residue!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, used to be my favorite when offered in Febreeze but they stopped making it, so I went to Glade. Debateable if it lasts as long as advertised (maybe in a small room or bathroom, but certainly not in larger rooms) Will be buying these again once these dozen start to run out :)
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Good Bulk Buy For My Business
customer_reviews.text: I buy these in bulk for the restrooms at my business to help keep them smelling fresh after they've been cleaned. Just a small amount works well, and lasts quite a long time. Only complaint is that it leaves a slight film on any surfaces that are not wiped down on a regular basis. Overall, a good product...
customer_reviews.author: Jason H Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Room Spray
customer_reviews.text: Powder Fresh is my favorite scent. Glade has sooooooo many scents that are amazing, which I also buy, but Powder Fresh is it for me because the smell of it actually reminds me of how my grandmother's house smelled before she passed away. I like the Glade brand though. Lasts a long time and even after it seemingly "wears off," the room still smells nice. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scent very economical
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case for the office restrooms and the smell is refreshing and not overpowering I will buy again now that I found I can purchase them for a dollar a can by buying a case I wish they had more scents
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: By the Case is handy
customer_reviews.text: I may be crazy, but I like that I can buy a whole case of air freshener. At times, we can go through one can in a few days, so having a good supply on hand is essential. This is my favorite fragrance for extended use and sometimes I spray it just to smell the cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: L. Steadman

product_meta.title: Glade Air Freshener, Room Spray, Lavender & Vanilla, 8 Oz, Pack of 12
product_meta.description: Style:Lavender & VanillaEliminate odor and make your home inviting for all with Glade Lavender & Vanilla Room Spray. Infused with essential oils, it instantly freshens the air in your bathroom, kitchen, living room, bedroom or den.
feature_bullets: New compressed gas technology delivers soft and quiet mist
Updated cap for more ergonomic hold and easier Spray

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
